messageSequence.content: The Inherited Recipe says:

Archieves inside flesh like a forgotten dream
A torn photo, a floppy disk.
A gift from your bloodline sending nourishment you can't smell
But you can feel.
It's telling you to 'slow down'
and other words you can no longer decode.
maybe this isn't a meal at all,
but a message
you chew on this thought of what this bowl of soup and what your body are telling you.

messageSequence.speaker: Your Lost Thought
messageSequence.content: Your Lost Thought says:

Focused in on this universe
Everything breathes
Into a single moment.
And then you blink...
eternityevaporatesflipsreverses
crys out
and then laughs
half-eaten
tip of the tongue,
a smothering darkness
It's just a feeling, but
she still has power
To sew broken images
and tell you, "this is your memory"
and these broken images love to play!
they're so mischevious.
Perhaps because they believe between a moment ago and the past
it was all a fascade.

Thread Topic: Jouissance.

messageSequence.speaker: SSSS_98
messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: Hey everyone,

messageSequence.speaker: SSSS_98
messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: has anyone seen this image floating around on here?

messageSequence.speaker: SSSS_98
messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: It keeps coming up for me, like a lot. I had to start a convo about it as so many thoughts and questions keep coming up for me around my relationship with my own body.

messageSequence.speaker: SSSS_98
messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: The first time I saw the image, it felt like a kind of optical illusion, if I blinked the image looked slightly different and it kind of tripped me out.

messageSequence.speaker: SSSS_98
messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: The second time, I think I started to really focus in on the vaginal area. I thought of my own gentalia and my body as a machine of pleasure and hesitation.

messageSequence.speaker: SSSS_98
messageSequence.content: SSSS_98 says: Objectification and beauty.

You're here, but are you here here?

"Remember," you are looking for yourself, you have option to click only up to 3 questions in the Oracle Engine
